The only reason humans are this advanced is because of our ability to think, to wonder and to suppose. To hone these skills in young orators , NYS has come up with an “ open debate “ , which essentially deals with understanding an issue from all perspectives , in order to gain a much broader understanding of what it essentially means . This not only expands the horizons of the mind, but also teaches us to understand the opinions of other people. You are required to put forth your views on a given topic in the presence of a jury and other participants who are free to question your take on the topic. Rules for open debate
 1) Participants who are participating in open debate have to register for the carnival as whole. Registration fee is Rs.500.
 2) There will be spot registration for open debate near the registration desk of assigned building free of cost.
 3) The participants are required to assemble in the assigned room.
 4) Every participant has to be present till the entire competition gets over, which will be maximum of 2hrs 30 minutes.
 Judging criteria:
 1) It will be based upon communication skills, affective body language and rebuttals.
 2) Negative marking will be awarded for use of obscene language and aggressive behavior.
 3) Decision of the moderator will be final. Participants should not indulge in any sort of arguments with the moderator.
 4) Decision of the judge will be final and cannot be questioned or disputed.
